author: tommykime
title: New minifigure torsos and face
review: You can't see it that well, but if you go on UK LEGO Shop and zoom in you can see they have a new female face pattern. FINALLY! The chest pieces are a sweatshirt pattern for the male and an orange blouse with a flower on the right of the torso for the female. The new girl face is a smile. They brought back old window shutters that are similar to the ones in the Harry Potter Shrieking Shack but were made to fit the new window fames. It also has a pizza piece which was rare back in the Early 2000s but you can get it in the Community Workers and City Corner sets and yes this one too. I CAN'T WAIT TILL IT COMES OUT FOR AMERICA.

author: ruf
title: It is good for a 4-years old child.
review:
This is the first lego set I bought to my son, He is just a little more than 3 years old. 


With the building instruction, you can build two trunks, one airplane, one boat and two building, All are simple. The basic bricks is a bit redundant, but advanced bricks is lacking. My son loves this set very much. Now he is studying how to pluging, pulling bricks, reading instructions ...

 

Pros

  • Good price per piece
  • Very useful brick separator (green)
  • A big plastic bucket (blue)

Cons

  • Lacking advanced bricks
  • Too many colors, so in each color, the bricks is fewness.

After all, it is a good choice to be the first lego set for your child. It seems a bit naive to me, but fit to my son.
